section.title: What is a collection?
section.p: A collections is a set of network objects created by a user. When a user requests a collection, they will receive a list of all objects in that collection with the latests details. Collections do not store the state of the objects at time of creation. If an object in a collection no longer exists, it will not be displayed in the list of objects.

section.title: What web browsers can I use to launch Network Explorer?
section.p: This app is designed to work in modern browsers supporting HTML5 and related web standards. Not all features may work correctly in older browsers. We recommend Firefox Extended Support Release (ESR) for stability.
